book.synopsys: A Guide To Teaching Basic Programming Skills For Parents And Teachers, With Step-by-step Explanations, Visual Examples, And Exercises. Covers Programming Concepts Including Loops, Lists, Functions, And Variables, And How To Build Games And Applications--
book.title_long: Teach Your Kids To Code: A Parent-friendly Guide To Python Programming
book.title: Teach Your Kids To Code: A Parent-friendly Guide To Python Programming
